医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为新项目提供 100 万英镑资助，以试验数字双胞胎大脑的帕金森疗法耗资 100 万英镑的研究项目将推进“深层脑刺激”，彻底改变帕金森病的治疗和管理https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/c2a31M-funding-boost-for-new-project-to-trial-Parkinsone28099s-treatments-on-digital-twin-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/c2a31M-funding-boost-for-new-project-to-trial-Parkinsone28099s-treatments-on-digital-twin-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f0b005f-5c1b-4196-982d-126cbf0bd383 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:22:00 -0500 £1M funding boost for new project to trial Parkinson’s treatments on digital twin brain
Daratumumab 治疗在 3 期试验中显示出治疗高危冒烟型多发性骨髓瘤的希望一种新的治疗方法为高危冒烟型多发性骨髓瘤 (SMM) 患者带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Daratumumab-treatment-shows-promise-for-high-risk-smoldering-multiple-myeloma-in-phase-3-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Daratumumab-treatment-shows-promise-for-high-risk-smoldering-multiple-myeloma-in-phase-3-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55cd039a-8b21-4c7e-9962-5c45264c505f Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:21:40 -0500 Daratumumab treatment shows promise for high-risk smoldering multiple myeloma in phase 3 trial
研究人员探索患者对放射学人工智能的看法AI 驱动的 MRI 可以将传统 MRI 中使用的潜在有毒染料减少高达 80%，但患者会接受 AI 驱动的脑部扫描吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Researchers-explore-病人-perceptions-of-AI-in-radiology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Researchers-explore-病人-perceptions-of-AI-in-radiology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c77beaa-b50d-4a78-829d-98f4de4497a1 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:17:00 -0500 Researchers explore patient's perceptions of AI in radiology
新的生物标志物测试方案可以缩短脓毒症的抗生素治疗时间由曼彻斯特大学研究人员领导的一项针对脓毒症新生物标志物测试方案的英国大型患者试验表明，可以在当前护理之前安全地停止抗生素治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/New-biomarker-testing-protocol-could-shorten-antibiotic-treatment-for-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/New-biomarker-testing-protocol-could-shorten-antibiotic-treatment-for-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49f1bf75-2cd6-432e-bda4-84da4d9d988a Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:09:00 -0500 New biomarker testing protocol could shorten antibiotic treatment for sepsis
关键血浆蛋白发出大脑衰老关键时期的信号研究人员发现了 13 种与大脑衰老相关的血浆蛋白，揭示了早期干预衰老相关大脑健康的动态模式和生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Key-plasma- Proteins-signal-ritic-periods-in-brain-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Key-plasma- Proteins-signal-ritic-periods-in-brain-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f628a037-542f-48b1-953e-153614babbad Tue, 10 Dec 2024 22:53:00 -0500 Key plasma proteins signal critical periods in brain aging
乳腺癌的化学足迹：一种新的暴露组学方法瑞典的研究人员探索了血浆样本中的化学物质暴露，发现了环境因素与受年龄、产次和初潮影响的乳腺癌风险之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Chemical-footprints-of-breast-cancer-A-new-exposomics-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Chemical-footprints-of-breast-cancer-A-new-exposomics-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ee6cb32-8734-4c7d-b682-18739ef47064 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 22:36:00 -0500 Chemical footprints of breast cancer: A new exposomics approach
STOMP 研究的中期分析发现替考维马对轻度至中度 Mpox 病例没有疗效根据一项名为“研究”的国际临床试验的中期数据分析，抗病毒药物替科维马不会缩短病变消退的时间，也不会减轻患有轻度至中度 II 型 MPOX 且发展为严重疾病的风险较低的成年人的疼痛。 Tecovirimat 治疗 Mpox (STOMP)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Interim-analysis-of-STOMP-study-finds-no-efficacy-for-tecovirimat-in-mild-to-moderate-Mpox-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Interim-analysis-of-STOMP-study-finds-no-efficacy-for-tecovirimat-in-mild-to-moderate-Mpox-cases.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=092b620c-9ca6-46f5-93ee-2a855379abdd Tue, 10 Dec 2024 22:33:20 -0500 Interim analysis of STOMP study finds no efficacy for tecovirimat in mild to moderate Mpox cases
新咨询提供了预防老年人术后谵妄的循证策略谵妄和认知能力下降是老年人麻醉和手术的常见并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/New-advisory-offers-evidence-based-strategies-to-prevent-postoperative-delirium-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/New-advisory-offers-evidence-based-strategies-to-prevent-postoperative-delirium-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=291e2e8e-c599-40ec-932b-70e750f62277 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 22:11:53 -0500 New advisory offers evidence-based strategies to prevent postoperative delirium in older adults
代谢成像检测卵巢癌亚型并预测化疗反应研究展示了代谢成像如何区分高级别浆液性卵巢癌 (HGSOC) 的高氧化磷酸化 (OXPHOS) 亚型和低氧化磷酸化 (OXPHOS) 亚型。通过评估代谢活动，它还可以识别对化疗的早期和可变反应，从而提高治疗策略的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Metabolic-imaging-detects-ovarian-cancer-subtypes-and-predicts-chemotherapy-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Metabolic-imaging-detects-ovarian-cancer-subtypes-and-predicts-chemotherapy-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cc44f06-c782-4d67-9652-b0506c1cf71b Tue, 10 Dec 2024 22:09:00 -0500 Metabolic imaging detects ovarian cancer subtypes and predicts chemotherapy response
